form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, 4m 39052

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. RANCISCO APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FEE STAMP one 1212 y OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. ELFECTIVE DECIAEKA Ot issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME SITLANI NARAINDAS TOLARAM IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above. IN CARE OF MR: KAMAL NARAINDAS SITLANI If you checked Extension" you must submit the reent per- MAILING (No and Street) (Apt No 3440 MONROE ST:-APT:3 mit you wish to have extended ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER ADDRESS (City) (State) IN U.S. (ZIP Code) SANTA CLARA CALIF. 95051 A- 634-733-884 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF-BIRTH(Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OE HAIR 8-30-1907 PARISTAN INDIAN BLACK BLACK HEIGHT 5 FEET INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS MOLE ON FOREHEAD 3. DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS SITLANIA NARAINDAS , C LARAM IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT SEATTLE WAS GRANTED 4-13-1975 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. 1 MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) PAN AMERICAN AIRWAYS FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME LATE TOLARAM GOPALDAS LATE MRS KEWALBAI NAVALRAI-LAL 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO / ast ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL SITLANI- NARAINDAS - TOLARAM SEATTLE 4-13-19 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: 6 PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD SAN. FRANCISC SEPTEMBER 25 MORETHAN 1YEAR NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL PLANE FILL IN ITEM 7. ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. 8. FILLIN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS ATTACHED IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED. STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED. STATE EXPIRATION DATE CHECK ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: RETIRED BUSINESS NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 567-3540326 NOT APPLICABALE 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) INDUSTRIAL ASSURANCE BLDG B.2 - CHU R CCHGATE BOMBAY-20 (INDIA) 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) LATINAMERICA - (BRASIL) MEXICO) - ENROPE. SPAIN LINCLUDING CANARY ISLANDS) - ALSO F Possi BLE JAPAN - HONGHONG SINGAPORE 12.
